channel.title: Comments on: Twitter – I do want to follow you but…
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Jonathan Kehayias
item.dc:creator: Jonathan Kehayias
item.description: I love that shirt and still wear it from time to time even though I changed twitter names long ago to @SQLPoolBoy.
item.content:encoded: I love that shirt and still wear it from time to time even though I changed twitter names long ago to @SQLPoolBoy.

item.title: By: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.dc:creator: Christiaan Baes (chrissie1)
item.description: I wonder what categories I fell in too to deserve your following. I guess you'll need to add God-like creatures to your list.
item.content:encoded: I wonder what categories I fell in too to deserve your following. I guess you’ll need to add God-like creatures to your list.
